iso_lifecycle.definition: Isomorphic patterns in lifecycles and cycles across scales capture structural equivalences in dynamic hierarchiesâ€”mappings where initiations, growths, maintenances, declines, and terminations preserve relations invariantly. These include cyclical recursions, growth-decay symmetries, and self-regulating phases, validated via systems theory (e.g., lifecycle patterns per web:8) and cross-scale analogies (e.g., quantum fluctuations to societal evolutions per web:3). Hard-to-vary invariants like fractal cycles enable forecasts; upgraded with tetralemma probes for paradox (affirm cycle/deny linearity/both in recursions/neither in eternities); scores >0.98 based on 2025 abstractions.
handling_rules: Map patterns to subatomic through cosmic scales plus principle; concrete from systems theory/web and cyclic overlays (e.g., particle lifetime to AI lifecycle).
Validate coverage across scales; flag gaps as speculative (e.g., cosmic cycle links).
Support sub-categories for compounds (e.g., hierarchical lifecycle); integrate diachronic depth (primordial cycles to 2025 AI lifecycles).
Export lean JSON; no external refs beyond principle.
Apply evaluations; tetralemmas resolve anisomorphisms; contradictions_ledger tracks inconsistencies.

properties.universality: string (e.g., Implicational: if precursors form, then entity cycles through phases)

properties.principle: string (hard-to-vary invariant, e.g., Recursive cycle toward renewal)

data.description: Nested cycles of initiation, growth, decline mapping invariantly.

examples.universality: Implicational: if precursors form, then entity cycles through phases

mappings.principle: Diversifying-homogenizing striving for efficiency and uniformity.

data.description: Detachment and absorption into origins; processes map invariantly (e.g., birth to decomposition).

mappings.cosmic: Black hole births to heat death.
mappings.principle: Detaching-reintegrative striving for new cycles and closure.

tetralemmas: Affirm cycle/deny linearity/both in recursions/neither in eternities.
